system.description:
Also at 5th level, you upgrade one of your pieces of gear. Choose one of the following options:

Upgraded Armor

You improve your armor. Its AC increases by +1 and you gain an additional ability based on the variety of armor it is.

  • Upgraded Light Armor
  • Upgraded Medium Armor
  • Upgraded Heavy Armor

 

Upgraded Weapon

You gain the following option:

  • Upgraded Weapon: your custom weapon deals an additional 1d4 of damage (for a total of 2d4 if it is heavy).

 

Upgraded Automaton

You improve your automaton. Its armor class increases to 14, its hit points increase to 35, and you choose one of the following upgrades.

  • Upgraded Medic
  • Upgraded Weapon
  • Upgraded Scanner

 

Additional Automaton Function

Your automaton gains a second set of capabilities. For example, if you had selected the Autonomous Weapon option at level 5, you could select the Autonomous Medic option now.
